summary: Tested auto-generated 197 blog posts feature. All core functionality working correctly - Blog page shows country section with 12+ popular countries and '197 Countries' badge, Country blog posts at /blog/country/{CODE} display correctly with SEO content, breadcrumbs, quick stats, and channel rankings. API endpoints return proper data structure. Sitemap at /api/sitemap.xml includes all 197 country blog URLs.

minor.issue: Root sitemap is cached by CDN, showing old version without /blog/country/ URLs. The /api/sitemap.xml works correctly with all 197 URLs. Static file has been regenerated but CDN cache refresh is pending.
minor.workaround: Use /api/sitemap.xml for the canonical sitemap URL

details.title_section: 'Top YouTubers by Country' with Globe icon
details.popular_country_cards: 12 popular country cards (US, IN, BR, JP, KR, MX, GB, ID, PH, DE, FR, RU)
details.view_all_expandable: 'View all 197 countries' expandable link works correctly
details.all_countries_grid: Expands to show all 197 countries in grid format

details.channel_cards: 3 channels displayed with rank badges, subscriber counts, view counts, video counts, daily growth, viral status
details.cta_section: 'Want to explore more?' with links to country page, compare, and all countries

details.data_structure: country_code, country_name, flag_emoji, slug, title, url fields present

details.required_fields: title, slug, country_code, country_name, flag_emoji, region, excerpt, content, category, channels, total_channels, read_time, generated_at, is_auto_generated
details.content_structure: Contains H2/H3 headers, conclusion section, internal links to /channel/ and /country/

case_insensitive_country_code.result: Returns same data as /api/blog/country/IN, normalizes to uppercase

context_for_next_testing_agent: Auto-generated 197 country blog posts feature fully implemented and working. Blog page at /blog shows 'Top YouTubers by Country' section with 12 popular country cards and '197 Countries' badge. Expandable 'View all 197 countries' link shows all countries. Country blog posts at /blog/country/{CODE} include breadcrumbs, quick stats, ranked channel cards, CTA section, and social share buttons. API endpoints /api/blog/countries and /api/blog/country/{code} return correct data. Sitemap at /api/sitemap.xml includes all 197 country blog URLs. Note: Root /sitemap.xml may show cached version without country blog URLs due to CDN - use /api/sitemap.xml as canonical.
